revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=ZyAIR B-4000 |revision=v1 |asin=B0001E5GLS;DE; |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |availability=EoL |est_release_date=2003 |fcc_date=05/03/2002 |fcc_id=O7J-GL242204-0T |pcb_id= |type=hotspot gateway |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model=CX82100 |cpu1_cspeed=166 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Global Sun GL242204-0T |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (32-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=ACX100 |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=00:A0:C5 |oui_eth=00:A0:C5 }} {{TagLine|Wireless LAN Hotspot Gateway}} :[ftp://ftp.zyxeltech.de/ZyAIR_B-4000/document/B4000_QuickStartGuide_online.pdf Manual @ '''ftp.zyxeltech.de'''] (DE), [http://web.archive.org/web/20140610013109/http://www.airwire.dk/pages/_filer/ZyAir-B4000HotSpot.pdf Datasheet @ '''airwire.dk''' (via archive.org)] :[http://web.archive.org/web/20140610013123/http://ftp.gwdg.de/pub/misc/zyxel-euro/B-4000/quick_start_guide/B-4000_2.pdf QIG @ '''ftp.gwdg.de''', ZyXEL Euro FTP server (via archive.org)] (EN), :[http://web.archive.org/web/20140610013121/http://ftp.gwdg.de/pub/misc2/zyxel-euro/B-4000/user_guide/B-4000_1.00.pdf User's Guide @ '''ftp.gwdg.de''' (via archive.org)] (EN)
A thermal printer (seems to be the ''SP-100 Statement Printer'') :was optionally available for this device. Default settings are per ''[[ZyXEL]]'''s manual.
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/24626-zyxelbb4000 Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (dated 2013-09-11) :Seems to be sold by ''Handlink'' as the WSG-5000 - [http://nm-spot.de/index.php?wsg-5000 whose ticket printers] :look mightily similar to those used by some later ''[[D-Link]]'' hotspot gateways, :probably including the [[D-Link DSA-3200]].
